name: BarracudaSecurityInsightFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Barracuda Security Insight provides real-time information on current cybersecurity threats that organizations and people are exposed to in the digital world. Barracuda Security Insight is centered around the Cybersecurity Index (CSI), which is a measure of the threat level spanning attack vectors including Email, Web, Network and weaponized file types such as PDF and Microsoft Office documents.

Armed with telemetry from billions of sensors deployed across the world, Barracuda Security Insight continually computes a Cybersecurity Index score based on the severity and volume of cyber attacks detected and blocked by Barracuda's security products and SaaS solutions. CSI scores between 80 and 110 are considered normal, whereas levels above that range are considered high or dangerous.

To get started, just say "Alexa, open Barracuda Security Insight." Alexa will then give a brief summary of the current global threat level. You can ask for more information on specific threat vectors (Email, Web, Network), delve into individual file types, or learn about Barracuda's security offerings.

If you need help at any time, say "Alexa, help." If you want to know the commands you can ask, say "list commands."

To learn more about Barracuda Security Insight and stay up-to-date on critical threats and recommendations, visit Barracuda Security Insight at https://csi.barracuda.com.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
